StartRetrobatMarquees -> Default marquee launcher
StartRetrobatMarqueesAS -> Marquee launcher with auto scraping marquee on screenscraper API -> Check your events.ini to activate MarqueeAutoScraping = true
StartRetrobatMarqueesASRA -> Marquee launcher with auto scraping marquee on screenscraper API, and RetroAchievements on RA API -> Check your events.ini to activate MarqueeRetroAchievements = true
